title: Biltong and roast butternut salad
ingredients: ['500g butternut squash - peeled, cored and diced', '1 sweet red pepper, cored and sliced', '3 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '100g mixed baby leaf salad - I love using rocket and herbs', '30g biltong', '3 tablespoons roasted mixed seeds', '50g feta cheese', 'chopped fresh parsley to garnish', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'balsamic glaze and more rapeseed oil to drizzle']
